title: KJo worries about his kids' idea about COVID19
description: Karan Johar is currently parenting his adorable kids –Roohi and Yash amid self-quarantine due to coronavirus scare. Karan recently gave us a glimpse of his little munchkins enjoying colouring together.
content:
